item.description:
A continuation of the "Off the Beaten Path" series of Thursday hikes takes us (slightly) out of the park to the Halfway Pond Conservation Area.

The entrance to Mast Road is about 1/2 mile south of the East Entrance to Myles Standish State Forest. It is directly opposite the Waverly Oaks golf course. The parking lot is two miles down Mast Road on the right. (Let's meet at the parking lot. )

The Wildlands Trust has a web page describing the <a href="http://www.wildlandstrust.org/tabid/210/Default.aspx">Halfway Pond Conservation Area property</a> and offering a map if you are interested. There are many trails within this beautiful 400 acrea property. We will try to approximate our usual 3-4 mile average.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Thursday morning Halfway Pond Conservation Area hike
